questions.question: You are a student with an A2 proficiency in English. Your class teacher will ask you a question. You should answer this question with the minimum of 60 words. Imagine your life in 10 years time. What will it look like?

answers.answer: In 10 years, my life will be quite different. I will be in my mid-30s, possibly married, and hopefully, I'll have a successful career. I'll likely be living in a bigger house, possibly with children. I'll be more experienced and confident, having learned from life's ups and downs. I'll continue to travel and learn new things.
